CustomField.description: NOT(ISBLANK(Expected_Audit_Date__c)): just apply if there is some date TODAY() > Expected_Audit_Date__c: today is greater than expected NOT(ISPICKVAL(Audit_Status__c, "Completed")): audit still on process NOT(ISPICKVAL(Audit_Status__c, "Cancelled")): audit not cancelled
CustomField.formula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Expected_Audit_Date__c)), TODAY() > Expected_Audit_Date__c, NOT(ISPICKVAL(Audit_Status__c, "Completed")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Audit_Status__c, "Cancelled")) )
CustomField.label: Overdue
